short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can save the current page to Bookmark.house.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can quickly bookmark currently browsed pages to Bookmark.house (https://bookmark.house).

Bookmark.house is a online bookmarking site. But it's not social.
Nobody except you can see the bookmarks that you saved in Bookmark.house.
You can easily bookmark pages with our browser extensions or bookmarklet.
You can tag and classify bookmarks, attach notes, and quickly find them by searching.
